altername_name: ポケットモンスターカオス
name: Pokémon Yellow Chaos
overview: Pokémon Yellow Chaos is a fan game developed and published by DaTateYT. The game was made to test out rom hacking tools, but then later became a full game. There is a second game in development as of right now. The second game is a ROM hack of Pokémon Emerald and will be called Pokémon Chaos 2.
